category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MECopyIdInContextLowerLevels
preference.preference_description: Determines if the in-context ID is copied to the assigned line for the subprocesses and suboperations during an assignment operation.See also the MECopyIdInContextToAssignedLine preference. Valid Values: True - The in-context ID is copied only for the items that are assigned to the subprocesses and suboperations during an assignment operation. The in-context ID of the subprocess or suboperation is not copied. False - The in-context ID is not copied to the assigned line for the subprocesses and suboperations during an assignment operation.
